message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer on the product, but I need to be within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, but $1,200,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000, which is still a good deal for both of us. This is my final offer, if you're not interested, I'll be moving on to other buyers.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $1,250,000. This is my final offer, if you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
